name: terraform-cli
description: A task for running authenticated terraform commands
author: jlorich

inputs.name: ArmServiceConnection
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure resource manager subscription to run Terraform against

inputs.name: initialize
inputs.label: Initialize Terraform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Runs terraform init before executing the provided script

inputs.name: scriptLocation
inputs.label: Script Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of script: File path or Inline script

inputs.name: scriptPath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fully qualified path of the script(.bat or .cmd when using Windows based agent and .sh when using linux based agent) or a path relative to the the default working directory

inputs.name: inlineScript
inputs.label: Inline Script
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can write your terraform scripts inline here

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the script is run.  Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)
